title: An Illustrated Guide to Welsh Monsters and Mythical Beasts
description: 'An illustrated guide to the mythical creatures from Celtic-Welsh myth, believed to inhabit the dramatic landscapes of Wales.'This short guide book by author and artist Collette J Ellis was funded via Kickstarter back in 2016 and sold out the following year. It was later developed into a new 'artist edition' which is available to pre-order until the end of November 2019 via PledgeManager: https://collettejellis.pledgemanager....The book is also due to be published by Eye of Newt Books Inc in 2020.
author: C.C.J.Ellis
